docs.snippet: The show, from the team behind the popular “Welcome to Night Vale,” promises a novelistic story in a serialized form, with dark plot turns.
docs.lead_paragraph: The show, from the team behind the popular “Welcome to Night Vale,” promises a novelistic story in a serialized form, with dark plot turns.
docs.abstract: Alice Isn't Dead, new podcast from Welcome to Night Vale creators Joseph Fink and Jeffrey Cranor, is latest offering in booming market for episodic, fictional audio programs that tell stories in radio reportage style; minimal production cost of podcasts makes it easy for good storytellers to get into business.

headline.main: ‘Alice Isn’t Dead,’ a Dark New Fictional Podcast in a Booming Market
headline.print_headline: A New Fictional Podcast Reflects a Booming Market

docs.snippet: Drawing on the Books of Samuel, this ABC drama focuses on King Saul as he tries to unite the 12 tribes of Israel against the Philistines.
docs.lead_paragraph: Drawing on the Books of Samuel, this ABC drama focuses on King Saul as he tries to unite the 12 tribes of Israel against the Philistines.
docs.abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews ABC biblical drama series Of Kings and Prophets.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Of Kings and Prophets,’ Biblical Tales Retold
headline.print_headline: Sire, a Soothsayer Is Talking Up Your Successor

docs.snippet: Researchers may have advanced a theory on the graffiti artist’s identity by using a variation of a technique used to track down criminals.
docs.lead_paragraph: Researchers may have advanced a theory on the graffiti artist’s identity by using a variation of a technique used to track down criminals.
docs.abstract: Researchers using forensic technique of geographic profiling find inconclusive evidence supporting Daily Mail's 2008 theory that anonymous street artist Banksy is actually Bristol man Robin Gunningham.

headline.print_headline: Who Is Banksy? New Twist on Old Theory

docs.snippet: Efforts in Chianti to reduce an exploding population of wild boars and deer, which devour grapes and the vines’ tender sprouts, are creating issues of their own.
docs.lead_paragraph: Efforts in Chianti to reduce an exploding population of wild boars and deer, which devour grapes and the vines’ tender sprouts, are creating issues of their own.
docs.abstract: Gaiole in Chianti Journal; farmers and wine growers in Tuscany, concerned over burgeoning wild boar and deer populations, build fences and redefine hunting laws to try and protect crops; region is well known for producing Chianti wines.

headline.main: They Feast on the Vines of Chianti, the Swine
headline.print_headline: They Feast on the Vines of Chianti, the Swine

docs.snippet: Facing off in Flint, Mich., two days before the state’s primary, the rivals displayed impatience, passion, policy knowledge and, perhaps, fatigue.
docs.lead_paragraph: Facing off in Flint, Mich., two days before the state’s primary, the rivals displayed impatience, passion, policy knowledge and, perhaps, fatigue.

headline.main: Democratic Debate Takeaways: Clinton and Sanders Grow Tired of Each Other

docs.snippet: Chinese telecommunications equipment maker ZTE Corp has asked its U.S. business partners to apply for export licenses, in line with U.S. restrictions imposed on the company, a source with direct knowledge of the situation told Reuters on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Chinese telecommunications equipment maker ZTE Corp has asked its U.S. business partners to apply for export licenses, in line with U.S. restrictions imposed on the company, a source with direct knowledge of the situation told Reuters on Tuesday.

docs.snippet: Peyton Manning walked away from the National Football League as he announced his retirement on Monday, but the NFL is not yet done with its investigation into allegations tying him to human growth hormone.

docs.snippet: A group of Flint, Michigan, parents and their children filed a class action on Monday alleging that gross negligence by Michigan Governor Rick Snyder and others caused the city's drinking water to become contaminated with lead.
